subject: Event testing?
msgSnippet: Hi, Any ideas as to how to write test cases for asynchronous calls? This is our scenario: We have code which sends out an SNMP request. We then register a
messageBody:
Hi,

Any ideas as to how to write test cases for asynchronous calls?

This is our scenario: We have code which sends out an SNMP request. We then register a listener, which is waken when the response has arrived and has been processed. The only idea I could think of was to register, invoke, wait() and have the event handler notify(). Any cleaner patterns?

- Yishay
 
         Yishay Mor
         Cisco systems, EMBU Israel  (QPM project)
         work  +972-9-9700031      home +972-4-6396602
         ymor@...
